data.text: @OrbitzCareTeam So I’ve replied in secret…I’ll let everyone know how I get on…im@totally done with getting past from pillar to post and not getting my refund! When you cancel twice one me then charge me more! Shame on you! You bunch of crooks!

@OrbitzCareTeam Yes, you should be! It’s an absolute joke trying to speak to someone! Been trying to speak to someone since 2020 and you’ve lied your face off about a refund! I now pay more, it gets cancelled then you’re just totally useless!
@BoricuaMacho A new trip must be booked and completed by the end of March this year. We're unable to offer any further extension.
@DiscoAnna Hi there, so sorry you've experienced this. Please private message us your itinerary number and email address so we can help. Thanks. ^JB
@BoricuaMacho @AmericanAir @Orbitz @OrbitzCareTeam Yup that’s orbitz will lie to your face and not give your money back!
@BoricuaMacho @OrbitzCareTeam I remember when customer service was important. Probably dating myself. https://t.co/fiLisT1cR3
@BoricuaMacho @AmericanAir They are stealing almost $2000 of my money too
@AmericanAir And I can't travel within YOUR limits. So you're just going to take my money and run? That's not how this works. How about paying forward to the customer instead of stealing from them?
@BoricuaMacho As you mentioned, ticket validity was extended and we hope to welcome you on board soon.
@BoricuaMacho @ShieldVoC @AmericanAir @Orbitz @OrbitzCareTeam sky mobile £450 2months roaming i cant make calls or access internet
